solution_line_template: The price of {num_armchairs} armchairs is ${armchair_cost_each} x {num_armchairs} = $<<{armchair_cost_each}*{num_armchairs}={total_armchair_cost}>>{total_armchair_cost}. Mrs. Dubois will pay ${total_armchair_cost} for the {num_armchairs} seats.

Thus the Coffee table price is ${total_invoice_amount} - (${sofa_cost} + ${total_armchair_cost}) = ${total_invoice_amount} - ${intermediate_sum} = $<<{total_invoice_amount}-{intermediate_sum}={coffee_table_price}>>{coffee_table_price}
